stageList.title: Quarry Entrance
stageList.desc: Even though we won the right to enter the basement, the Lobotomy Corp. Branch seemed to be long overtaken by the casino. Slaves dig away at walls, security guards watch them, and Peccatula chew at iron bars… A lot stood in our way.

stageList.title: Underground Factory Gate
stageList.desc: Gregor’s breathtaking attempt at insurrection caused security to release the Peccatula. Taking a better look at these creatures, though… They don’t seem to be following any orders, instead opting to attack any human in sight. If that’s the case…

stageList.title: Production Line 1
stageList.desc:
We managed to reach the next floor. Colorful containers awaited us in an unguarded space.
There’s no one here, so what’s with this ominous feeling we’re getting while entering?

stageList.title: Ice Castle Where Neighbors Lie
stageList.desc: We made it across the frozen landscape and reached the end of the mines. In the distance, I saw a massive castle of ice… and an unexpected guest.
